entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] output path passed to `dotnet publish` does not result in a runnable project at the published path #94319
  • error MC1000: Unknown build error, 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' #94318
  • Reconsider property injection with required properties #94323
  • Use of `ref readonly` instead of `in` in libraries is a breaking change for F# callers #94317
  • CoreCLRTestLibrary `TestLibrary.Utilities.IsNativeAot` adds ~4mb to the NativeAOT exe on Linux #94313
  • Investigate/optimize performance of TrimAnalysisPatterns tracked by ILLink Roslyn analyzer #94312
  • Guide for building standalone mono cross based runtime #94311
  • DependencyContext RuntimeGraph expected behavior. #94305
  • SocketsHttpHandler cannot authenticate NTLM with username format user@domain.com #94303
  • [wasi] Print message with `AppBundle` path after build/publish #94291
    8.0.x
  • Memory leak when serializing large string properties with System.Text.Json #94290
  • Improve and unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #94289
    9.0.0
  • [InlineArray] should not have [EditorBrowsableState(Never)] #94283

Closed

  • System.Text.Json JsonConverter doesn't serialize nullable properties #94314
  • [API Proposal]: Add an interface to unify property/field access #90901
    Future
  • dotnet run quits immediately on Mac (Apple Silicon) in certain scenarios. #94315
  • ServiceProviderEngineScope captures the same object twice into a list of disposables #91179
    Future
  • Get Span view of embedded resource data #26101
    Future
  • Use Vector512<T> in SpanHelpers.Fill #94276
  • [API Proposal]: Indexer / GetItem for {Immutable}HashSet #94302
  • Error: Using UserPrincipal.GetGroups() get an exception (A local error has occurred) #94282
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator encounters namespace conflicts in using statements #93498
    9.0.0
  • IntersectBy second parameter has wrong type #94296
  • WASI apps are too big #94286
    9.0.0
  • Debugger display of dictionary types and `DebuggerDisplayAttribute.Name` #88736
    Future
  • Wasm Test failure: 'C:\helix\work\workitem\e\wbt' is not a valid project file #94281

PullRequests

Created

  • Make System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests run sequentially #94324
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • JIT: revise local assertion prop to use bit vectors #94322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide Microsoft.Win32.Registry.AccessControl package readme #94321
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Re-enable S.T.Json with source generation tests #94320
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94308
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. (#94267) #94307
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][ci] Improve CI perf by excluding intermediate dir from iOS app bundles #94304
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] fix stale memory on suspended thread #94299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • Restore EETypeNode to the state before we deleted reflection blocking #94287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove Ubuntu 18.04 from libraries Helix queues #94293
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Small cleanup for Lock in Mono #94275
    area-VM-threading-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] improve promise resolve marshaling after exit #94288
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 40 #94204
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix parallel SuperPMI pass-through logging #94284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix a couple interpreter pgo problems #94295
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][AOT] Disable general Hybrid Globalization tests #94297
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. #94267
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Provide Extensions.Hosting.Systemd package readme #94055
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • JIT: morph blocks in RPO #94247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    needs-area-label
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • we need to skip the SIP region in the last step of handling the alloc region #94249
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix redundant conditional in HttpConnection #94278
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Document the requirements the SDK/CLI has for a project to interact with tooling. #36638
  • NuGet Package can't find "latest" version #36637
  • Unable to use `dotnet sln add` to add an esproj to a solution #36617

PullRequests

Created

  • Reenable AOT tests disabled during the net9 migration #36636
    untriaged
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2306852 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • Open issue: nullability analysis of collection expressions #7626

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Create and assign [field|property]" quick fix generates Linux line endings on Windows machine/project #70685
  • Rename Function does not rename #region (only in preview) #70684
  • Complete Word fails in collection expression #70677
  • MSBuildWorkspaceLoader cannot access binlog (regression in dotnet/format tests) #70674
    17.9 P2

Closed

  • Duplicate syntax node callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseType #70488
    17.9
  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #70238
    17.9
  • Cross compilation for `arm64` on `x64` with a source generator in a solution fails #60744
    17.6
  • Unify the way MethodCompiler gets synthesized lowered method bodies #67104
    Backlog
  • Endless popup error messages #70025
    17.9
  • AnalyzerRunner throws an Exception: Missing assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild.BuildHost' #70139
    17.9
  • Add documentation for IDE0210 #65761
  • Add documentation for IDE0230 #65764
    17.6
  • "Remove Unused Parameter" Refactoring #67229
    17.9
  • [Feature request]: An option to opt-in for internal API analysis for `IDE0051` (Remove unused private member) #69483
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70686
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update NuGet-packages.md for 17.8 #70682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2307001 #70681
  • Only use length-based dispatch optimization under `/optimize+` #70680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 67328 - Update the casing of remove unecessary usings in lightbulb menu #70675
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid duplicate analyzer callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax and BaseListSyntax nodes #70655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70683
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 #70679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix capitalization in recently added comments. #70678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Rely on GenerateMethodBody/SynthesizesLoweredBoundBody APIs to synthesize body for field like event accessors #70657
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add MSBuild.BuildHost to AnalyzerRunner project #70361
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Disable specific squareBracket completion tests #70673
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, 17.9
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, 17.9
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Integration fixes #70635
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70668
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unskip error list tests #63623
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Fix Crash in AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider #70647
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProjectName.deploy.cmd fails on IISExpressUserProfileDirectory check fails if Documents folder is OneDrive synced #51835
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 9 #51834
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51832
  • Debugging: Update dictionary debuggers in aspnetcore to follow the new standard #51827
  • Blazor: Error: No element is currently associated with component 43 #51825
  • applicationInitialization on Azure Webapp does not work with OutOfProcess - 502.3 The request is not supported. #51823
  • Can't start debugging with MS Edge #51822

Closed

  • Different scoped services lifetime in Blazor Web App with Server render mode #51768
    Discussions
  • UserManager.ChangePasswordAsync doesn't sign out on other devices #51450
    Discussions
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 8 #44984
    8.0.0
  • Explore switching MultipartReaderStream to use IndexOf #49223
    9.0-preview1
  • In .NET 8 Blazor Web App, FontAwsome icons not displayed when navigating to a page #51696
  • User's Email Claim is always returned emtpy #50583
  • AuthorizeRouteView not showing Authorizing child content #51642
  • ASP .NET 8 RC2 Routing & UseStaticFiles #51677
  • WebHost doesn't detect ASPNETCORE_HTTP_PORTS #51125
  • Blazor Loader/Publisher Improvements #51821
  • Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: regeneratorRuntime is not defined #51828
  • Signalr Client can't communicate with server after reconnect #51290
  • Azure Web App For Containers: Certificate Authentication Fails with 403 when Client certificate is forwarded #51819
  • Perf regression: caching #51756
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51783
  • Perf regression: https, updates #51792
  • Rename Microsoft.AspNetCore.Testing #49776
    9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] When testing end-to-end in Github Workflow, sometimes a client may not receive a message #51492

PullRequests

Created

  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Remove Boyer-Moore in favor of IndexOf #51815
    Perf, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update eslint js doc plugin #51816
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update area-owners.md #51647
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.InternalTesting #51713
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, .NET 9 Planning
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51813
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51812
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Issues

Closed

    8.0.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to scroll carouselview inside of a tabbed page #18490
  • App with a Page derived from Multipage<page> throws an error #18489
  • iOS: Editor wrapped in border cuts off text if scroll bar is needed. NET8 RC2 #18486
  • iPad FlyoutPage Master width is half the screen #18485
  • Android: Certain span sizes create unwanted vertical shift in label #18482
  • Using CollectionView IsGrouped="True" bound to ObservableCollection causes crash #18481
  • Android underlined label shows 'space' at linebreak #18480
  • MAUI NET 8 RC-2 : CollectionView and ListView items missing or wrong #18479
  • TapGestureRecognizer on Span does not work on Windows #18478
    Backlog
  • Need the abiltiy to Activate a window from within the program #18477
  • There is a lot of space between each data when nested collection view is implemented in .NET MAUI in iOS #18476
  • Maui Popup Randomly Disrupts the Transitional View #18474

Closed

  • [Android,iOS] Real device crash on navigation #18372
  • Windows: CollectionView is flickering when an item is moved #17369
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Padding not applied to AbsoluteLayout within ScrollView when navigating through app shell. #14797
  • FlyoutContent is blank on iOS #18475
  • [regression/8.0.0] Entry ignores TextColor on iOS #17843
    .NET 8 SR1
  • CommunityToolkit.Maui.Views.Popup Button Text Alignment #18195
  • Accessing string resource throws a false FileNotFoundException in Android #18225
    Backlog
  • How can I run my Maui projects with the Maui source code fully open to me in Visual Studio so I can test/solve bugs I find in the Maui code? #18270

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the versions to the ProjectCapabilities #18494
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix the incorrect manifest project name #18488
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18472
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Bump version to generate 8.0.1.x versioning #18491
  • Update main to the latest public versions #18487
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Ignore use of obsolete iOS/Catalyst API until we update to iOS bump with new APIs #18468
  • Update release branch versions #18473

Updated

  • Force ShapeHandler to exist when adding shape to border #18076
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Fixed Path size calculations #17722
    area/drawing ✏️, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Removes freeze using SecureStorage #17928
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Backport #16762 - [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #18463
    area/ListView
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix 18457 #18458
    community ✨
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contains fallback translation fails when the array parameter has AsQueryable #32218
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the Contains item argument (and possibly other non-lambda arguments) #32217
  • Support CRUD operations for updatable views #32216
  • QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor does not visit recursively when converting List.Contains to Queryable.Contains #32215
  • Segmentation fault on Migrate() on s390x #32209
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor ignores Contains item visitation #32208

Closed

  • Emit warning or information log message when using `QuerySplittingBehavior.SplitQuery` unneccessarily #32213
  • Exception trying to use EF.Functions.StandardDeviationSample #32212
  • Make existing model building conventions more extensible #28866
    MQ
  • Move detection of ColumnAttribute in RelationalTypeMappingInfo to conventions #11124
    MQ
  • EF Core 7 + Oracle database = TPT inheritance doesn't work #32206
  • IndexOutOfRange thrown from In-Memory when using union on owned types #32159
  • Daily Build 23524.5 UseSQLServer LogTo method requires explicit package ref to logging #32204
  • Microsoft.Extensions dependencies in 8.0 latest nightly broken #32171
  • TIL Include() doesn't always load entities #32144
  • Explicit default in DB is not preserved in EF with HasDefaultValue #32123
  • Support arbitrary expressions in inline collections (translate to VALUES) #30734
    8.0.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ModelBuilderTest asserts more robust and extensible #32221
    providers-beware
  • Add more tests for ConventionSet and fix the found issues. #32220
  • Visit arguments in QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor after converting List.Contains #32219
  • Take into account Contains item visitation in SqlNullabilityProcessor #32214

Merged

  • Allow to ignore attributes when finding type mapping #32193
  • Refactor out the baselines for CSharpRuntimeModelCodeGeneratorTest #32196
  • Update DailyBuilds to indicate build to use for EF8 #32210

Updated

  • Replace explicit richCodeNavigationEnvironment in azure-pipelines-richnav.yml #32082

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Unwind changes made to temporarily unblock the .net 9 codflow #17453

PullRequests

Updated

  • Split current CI pipline #17370
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [release/6.0] Add alpine to CI for source-build #13074
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Re-enable SB tests #17672
    Area-SourceBuild
